m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- July 25, 2010 8:13 pm Thriving China is ever more open for business By Chen Deming Comments Foreign companies drive economic growth abroad through their Chinese operations, creating jobs in developed countries, writes Chen Deming For the past year, China has expanded domestic demand and worked to attract foreign investment, contributing to the global recovery. However, concerns have recently been floated , not least among foreign businesses, that China is now less welcoming of foreign investment. In fact, China will open wider in the future.
